headline: LEYBOLD INFICON COLD CATHODE AND PIRANI GAUGE CONTROLLER
description: Cold Cathode and Pirani Vacuum Gauge Controller Part number 850-300-G1
specstable:
Manufacturer Inficon
Model CC3 / 850-300-G1
Description Cold Cathode, Pirani Vacuum Gauge Controller
Gauge Types Controlled Cold Cathode, Pirani
Cables Included No
Other Information
Units: Torr, Mbar, Pascal (selectable)

  • 1 Cold Cathode board 850-127 (sensor not included)
5 decades pressure range: 1.0x10-7 to 1.0x10-2 Torr

  • 2 Pirani boards 850-147
each controls one TR901 sensor per board (not included)
1E-4 to 1E3 Torr range

  • I/O remote control and 3 setpoint relays board 850-122
  • RS232 Interface and CPU board 850-112
Extended Description Details at Inficon IG3 CC3 with diagrams and sensors.pdf
Power Requirements 120/240 V 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 8.000 in (20.3 cm)
Depth 12.000 in (30.5 cm)
Height 3.500 in (8.9 cm)
Weight 10 lb (5 kg)
